mapper.select: SELECT m.name, m.phone, p.totalCount, p.remainingCount, p.startDate, p.endDate FROM pt_package p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId ORDER BY p.endDate
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pt_package (memberId, trainerId, productId, totalCount, remainingCount,startDate, endDate, price, created_at) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{trainerId}, #{productId}, #{totalCount}, #{remainingCount}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{price}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE pt_package SET isActive = false WHERE memberId = #{memberId} AND isActive = true

UPDATE pt_package SET trainerId = #{trainerId}, productId = #{productId}, startDate = #{startDate}, endDate = #{endDate}, totalCount = #{totalCount}, remainingCount = #{remainingCount}, price = #{price} WHERE memberId = #{memberId}
mapper.select: SELECT m.name, m.phone, p.totalCount, p.remainingCount, p.startDate, p.endDate FROM pt_package p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId WHERE m.name LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.endDate

SELECT m.name, m.phone, p.totalCount, p.remainingCount, p.startDate, p.endDate FROM pt_package p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId WHERE m.phone LIKE CONCAT(#{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY p.endDate

SELECT p.memberId, m.name, m.phone, m.birthDate, p.totalCount, p.remainingCount, p.startDate, p.endDate FROM pt_package p INNER JOIN member m ON p.memberId = m.memberId WHERE p.trainerId = #{trainerId} ORDER BY m.name
SELECT top 1 memberId, trainerId, productId, totalCount, remainingCount, startDate, endDate, price FROM pt_package WHERE memberId = #{memberId} ORDER BY endDate DESC
